properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 4:20AM EST until January 15 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville affecting Troup County

Line Creek near Senoia affecting Coweta...Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Oconee River near Penfield.
* Until this evening.
* At 4 AM Wednesday the stage was 13.4 feet...and
falling.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* At 13 feet...Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs along
the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia
Highway 15 bridge. The right bank begins to overflow into
agricultural land and pastures with a foot or two of water.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.5 feet on Jul 8 2013.
